pages.text: Pali mtengo wa mkuyu ndi mtengo wa azitona
Ndi pali phiri la Sinai
Ndi pali Mzinda uwu wa mtendere
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu m’chikombole chabwino
Ndipo tinamutsitsa kukhala wapansi zedi
Kupatula amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, iwo adzalandira mphotho yosatha
Kodi ndi chiyani, chimene chili kukupangitsani kukana tsiku la chiweruzo
Kodi Mulungu si woweruza wabwino kuposa oweruza onse
Werenga! M’dzina la Ambuye wako amene analenga
Yemwe adalenga munthu kuchokera ku kadontho kamagazi oundana
werenga! Ndipo Ambuye wako ndiye wopereka mowoolowa manja
Amene anaphunzitsa ndi cholembera
Anaphunzitsa munthu chimene sanali kuchidziwa
Iyayi! Ndithudi, munthu amalakwa mopyola muyeso
Chifukwa amaganiza kuti iye ndi oima payekha
Ndithudi! Nonse mudzabwerera kwa Ambuye wanu
Kodi mwamuona munthu amene amaletsa
Kapolo pamene akupemphera
Kodi mwamuona ngati iye alikutsatira chilangizo chabwino
Kapena kulamulira machitidwe abwino
Ndiuze ngati iye akana choonadi ndipo salabadira
Kodi iye sadziwa kuti Mulungu amaona zinthu zonse
Iyayi! Ngati iye sasiya, Ife tidzamududuluza pogwira tsitsi la pa mphumi pake
Mphumi yabodza ndi yochimwa
Ndipo mulekeni iye aitane anzake oti amuthandize
Ife tidzaitana osunga Gahena
Iyayi! Usamumvere iye. Gunditsa mphumi yako pansi ndipo idza pafupi ndi Mulungu
